## Installation

### Using Docker (Recommended)

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yudhnaa/macro-mate.git
cd macro-mate
git checkout [TAG_NAME]
docker-compose up -d
```

### From Source

See [Getting Started](https://github.com/yudhnaa/macro-mate#getting-started) in README.md
